Question: Espressif Incorporated CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Espressif Incorporated

Product: ESP32-C61

- Improved wireless connectivity and expanded memory options
- Supports WiFi 6 on two modes (802.11ax and 802.11b/g/n) and includes Bluetooth 5 (LE) radio with support for long-range operation through advertisement extension and coded PHY
- Features support for BLE Mesh 1.1 protocol and Quad SPI PSRAM at a frequency of up to 120MHz
- Includes support for Matter, the open-source, connectivity protocol for smart home and IoT applications
- Supports WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5, TWT (Target Wake Time), OFDMA, and MU-MIMO for high-quality, low-latency connection between devices
- Utilizes Espressif's well-established IoT Development Framework (IDF) for support
- Pseudo-static RAM (PSRAM) inclusion improves the number of supported applications and ease of development
Summary_cn:
乐鑫科技股份有限公司

产品：ESP32-C61

- 改进的无线连接性和扩展的存储选项
- 支持两种WiFi 6模式（802.11ax和802.11b / g / n），并包括支持通过广告扩展和编码PHY进行长距离操作的蓝牙5（LE）无线电
- 支持BLE Mesh 1.1协议和最高120MHz频率的Quad SPI PSRAM
- 包括对Matter的支持，这是智能家居和物联网应用的开源连接协议
- 支持WiFi 6、蓝牙5、TWT（目标唤醒时间）、OFDMA和MU-MIMO，以实现设备之间高质量、低延迟的连接
- 利用乐鑫科技成熟的物联网开发框架（IDF）提供支持
- 伪静态RAM（PSRAM）的包含改善了支持的应用数量和开发的便利性
